attributes.action: A General Election now to get Brexit concluded one way or enough.
attributes.additional_details:
I believe the people of this country, wherever you voted leave or remain are now feed up after 3 years of this sad saga. We had a referendum, a result, but this Parliament has simply been unable to deliver on that result. I think most people just want it done, and have get on with more important domestic issues, which are not being addressed.
A General Election would let the people give a new government a mandate on how to proceed.
attributes.background: For the first time ever, tonight, the Opposition party abstained from voting for an early General Election, which they had been calling for, so effectively denying the people a vote. The government has no working majority, Parliament is in disarray and a Speaker now, not so impartial.
